name: WeBlog4Me
description:
You have discovered a web blog from a parallel universe. Disturbingly, it seems you are able to control the author's behavior with just a press of a button, from the blank stare of a screen far away. Can you guide the user out of danger? Or will you succumb to alien influence?

There are four possible ways for the game to end- but can you find the good ending?

Audio is "Creepyatmo" by Crowander.

Made for Themed Horror Game Jam #9.

Theme 1: The Grim Aftermath

Bonus Challenges:

-Post-Apocalypse

-Journal

-Fight to Survive
